title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without any webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP response code 200 OK, but no content is displayed.
EB: I expect that when no webapps are deployed and a URL is accessed, the server should return an HTTP error code 404.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 from the following location: http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access any URL on the server in a web browser
